question: Bring out the only incorrect statement:
option2: Shikaripura Ranganatha Rao discovered many harappan sites in India
option3: Yajurveda is a collection of sacrificial formulae
option4: Yajurveda mentions the battle of ten kings
answer: Yajurveda mentions the battle of ten kings
explanation: Battle of Ten Kings is mentioned in Rig-Veda
